metadata.Title: CVE-2011-4968 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: nginx http proxy module does not verify peer identity of https origin server which could facilitate man-in-the-middle attack (MITM)

notes.Note: seth-arnold> Backporting this fix is non-trivial and may break deployed applications. Someone who really wanted this could use stunnel as a work-around until 16.04 LTS is released.

criterions.comment: nginx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
